topics.body:
"@MoogSourceVermona":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6a65c6368727e4a001d49#post_55a6a65c6368727e4a001d49
I find there are a lot of OST's that do the trick for that.

Like Sonic, Sonic has a lot of entertaining music outside of it being background music.

Mario Kart has a lot of memorable and up beat music that can be listened to on its own.

Bastion has a lot of great songs.

You just have to find the one's that catch the ear drums.

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6a86263687232940012c0#post_55a6a86263687232940012c0
i used to like Sonic music when i was in Elementary School but i got tired of it once i started digging through music that was heavier, experimental, technical, diverse etc. and now Crush 40 stuff just sounds like bland commercial radio rock to my ears

Mario Kart is boring to me and so is Bastion but i wont say that the songs are badly done.

Vib Ribbon is the only video game OST that does anything for me
